original_text: but they did not find anything they could do, for all the people were hanging on his words.
korean_text: 백성이 다 그에게 귀를 기울여 들으므로 어찌할 방도를 찾지 못하였더라

sentences.original_text: but they did not find anything they could do
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들은 할 수 있는 아무것도 찾지 못했다

sentences.original_text: for all the people were hanging on his words
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 백성이 그의 말씀에 귀를 기울이고 있었기 때문입니다
